name: Cute Candy Deluxe
description:
Cute Candy Deluxe is very addictive and exciting candy matching game. Cute Candy Deluxe is casual puzzle game with deliciously interesting levels. Cute Candy Deluxe is match 3 based game with very addictive and best gaming levels. You have limited move to complete each level. Each level is new match 3 puzzle to solve. If you like challenging puzzle games than Cute Candy Deluxe is best match 3 game for you.

Game Features:
- Pleasuring game music
- Delicious Cute Candy Deluxe game graphics
- Free Power-Ups
- Best Match 3 Puzzle game

How to Play:
Just crush cute candies by matching 3 or more same kind of candies to finish the task in limited moves. Use Power-Ups to score more and to finish task early.

This game is free to play, just share it with your friends to enjoy this match three puzzle game. Cheers!!
